review_preview: They have English menus as well as Spanish - not many places in Ferrol have an English option.All the food we had was delicious! Our favorites were the shark and the prawns. The food comes out quickly and the waiters /waitresses are attentive and...
review_full: They have English menus as well as Spanish - not many places in Ferrol have an English option. All the food we had was delicious! Our favorites were the shark and the prawns. The food comes out quickly and the waiters /waitresses are attentive and nice! Some days they serve lunch longer than other days so try to go by 2 o’clock for lunch to be safe. Starts getting busy around 2:30.

author: catheriner201
review_preview: I ordered The Croca Ternera Gallega... wow one of the best beef I have eaten in my life!! Incredible ! And the service was excellent as well... 100% recommended!
review_full: I ordered The Croca Ternera Gallega... wow one of the best beef I have eaten in my life!! Incredible ! And the service was excellent as well... 100% recommended!

author: javisanro8888
review_full: Descubrimento dun lugar onde a paz gastronòmica obtense cada minuto que estás no local. Calidade, calidade, e calidade! Todo perfecto! Mestria, bo facer, servizo, gañas de agradar e profesionalidade. Bodega exquisita acorde cun menú onde o produto de mercado gaña no fogòn con propostas naturais e saudabeis. Por moitos anos e por moitas veces! Repito un luxo!

author: JarmNaron
review_full: No es la primera vez que mi esposa y yo visitamos el restaurante de David, pero en este caso se trató de una comida en familia. Excepcional cómo siempre, la atención, el ambiente, difícil destacar el mejor pase del menú, dado que todos exquisitos y con adecuada presentación. Enhorabuena David !!!!!  Otro ejemplo del buen hacer en la nueva cocina. 100% aconsejable.

author: 27Cris08
review_full: Estuvimos cenando mi marido y yo por nuestro aniversario. Muy recomendable. Solo podemos dar las gracias a David por hacernos un menú increíble a pesar de ponérselo muy complicado, pues mi marido no puede tomar nada procedente del mar y aún así el menú superó todas nuestras expectativas con creces. Por tanto, gracias por todo! Sin duda, en nuestra próxima visita a Ferrol, volveremos.

author: AustinExpat
title_review: Wonderful find! Fred shrimp to perfection, lovely pairing of Albariño, Gambones Enchilados very creative
review_preview: This is a lovely find in Ferrol that is embarrasingly inexpensive given the caliber of the chef's skill. We arrived late into Ferrol and stayed at the Parador but wanted to explore the local cuisine. We are American expats who live in Madrid and travel...
review_full: This is a lovely find in Ferrol that is embarrasingly inexpensive given the caliber of the chef's skill. We arrived late into Ferrol and stayed at the Parador but wanted to explore the local cuisine. We are American expats who live in Madrid and travel extensively. Frank is a welcome choice -- an intriguing take on fried shrimp cooked to perfection and served with a tangy mayo-based sauce. Shrimp can be challenging -- cooked too long and they shrink and become tough. Frank's were pulled perfectly - still tender and sweet and the light coating of shredded phyllo was inventive. We were disappointed that the prior table ordered the last pulpo, but we were quickly satisfied by the gabones (shrimp) enchilados. Imagine crawfish etouffee with a Spanish twist. What do you get -- a roux using olive oil and pimenton served on bomba rice. Great. The selection of wines was good -- we enjoyed a dry white Albariño, Tricó. Nicely executed. Highly recommended.

author: H3935OFboba
review_preview: Disappointing. First courses were OK but the main was strange. Service and price was OK. Very busy with good atmosphere.
review_full: Disappointing. First courses were OK but the main was strange. Service and price was OK. Very busy with good atmosphere.

author: SamuelCP22
title_review: La comida más peor que he probado en Galicia - The worst food I've tried in Galicia.
review_preview: Precios muy altos y comida con mucha voz y sin alma. Cuando he dicho que no gustamos la comida, no han hecho nada. Las camareras son muy simpáticas pero prefiero lugares con menos estilo y más alma, sabor y comida buena. Se puede encontrar restaurantes...
review_full: Precios muy altos y comida con mucha voz y sin alma. Cuando he dicho que no gustamos la comida, no han hecho nada.  Las camareras son muy simpáticas pero prefiero lugares con menos estilo y más alma, sabor y comida buena. Se puede encontrar restaurantes muy ricos en Ferrol - hay mucho.  ------ Very high prices and food that's all presentation and no taste. When we asked why we hadn't finished the food, and we said we didn't like it, they did nothing to remedy our experience.  The waitresses are nice but I prefer places with less attitude and more soul, taste and good food, which are abundant in Ferrol.

author: Crossbow44
review_preview: Modern but Galician style, fresh fish,shell fish and meats, seating outdoors and indoors, excellent kitchen and great service and good wine selection
review_full: Modern but Galician style, fresh fish,shell fish and meats, seating outdoors and indoors, excellent kitchen and great service and good wine selection

author: Bronwen F
review_preview: Our starter were chiperone croquets, which were smooth in texture and tasty. Don't let the black ink colour put you off!We followed with the fish and shellfish platter for two people. Our waiter Carlos asked if we would like chips with the fish. When...
review_full: Our starter were chiperone croquets, which were smooth in texture and tasty. Don't let the black ink colour put you off! We followed with the fish and shellfish platter for two people. Our waiter Carlos asked if we would like chips with the fish. When served on a lovely silver platter they were Crisps! I took them back and said not to worry, we had salad. I asked for and got salt.. We wanted a bottle of water and had to ask twice.  We left feeling disappointed. We felt that there should have been finger bowls provided, wipes for your fingers, and empty plate for your shells and fish bones. We wanted a special treat for our Birthday's and it fell short. Good carparking, sanitizer provided and masks worn by all staff

author: AngelaCane
review_full: Cocina excepcional , platos sabrosos y con el toque de sabor perfecto y nada barroco. Comida para paladares exquisitos  Atención magnífica y muy profesional digna del mejor restaurante Gourmet

author: JOSE LUIS R
review_full: He cenado el pasado día 5 con unos amigos y la atención tanto de los camareros como de David ha sido impecable. La comida de autor, exquisita. Hemos disfrutado de la noche. Un restaurante para recomendar encarecidamente y por supuesto volver. Es de agradecer el hecho de que en época de pandemia personas como David decidan abrir un restaurante de estas características en Ferrol. Enhorabuena.

author: GrandTour14564457804
review_full: Muchísimas gracias a todo el equipo pero en especial a David por su cariño, delicadeza y amor por lo que hace…. El mejor salmón que he comido nunca, zamburiñas de espectáculo, el rape único( y soy de la zona), steack tartar inigualable, lasaña de conejo de muerte… me he quedado con ls ganas de saber como haces las almejas casi al natural, pero prometemos volver!!!! Y el mejor remate con una torrija incomparable!!! Gracias por el mejor aniversario y un abrazo de Rebeca y Adrián

author: Watson_Inc
review_preview: Visited O Pincho several times since being in Ferrol, Spain. Neat tidy Tapas Bar with where Alex the Manager and his friendly staff are most welcoming.  Tapas is very good and many   Vino Blanco or Vino Tinto  wines to choose from as well as Beers....
review_full: Visited O Pincho several times since being in Ferrol, Spain. Neat tidy Tapas Bar with where Alex the Manager and his friendly staff are most welcoming. Tapas is very good and many   Vino Blanco or Vino Tinto wines to choose from as well as Beers. Very popular Bar.

author: K5313DBdanielg
review_preview: Please try las zamburiñas and the local wines! Los chipirones a la plancha as well! The bar had an excellent host and a vivid atmosphere!
review_full: Please try las zamburiñas and the local wines! Los chipirones a la plancha as well! The bar had an excellent host and a vivid atmosphere!

author: cote60
review_preview: Just arrived in Ferrol and it was suggested we try tapas at Pincho, it did not disappoint , tasty and good size tapas accompanied by a nice red Mencia. Cheers🍷
review_full: Just arrived in Ferrol and it was suggested we try tapas at Pincho, it did not disappoint , tasty and good size tapas accompanied by a nice red Mencia. Cheers🍷

author: froggychap
title_review: Enjoyable but have eaten better in Galicia
review_preview: The staff were friendly and helpful and the variety of shellfish we ate were good, but I was disappointed in the fish platter which was a variety of fresh fish which I thought were overcooked. The wine list is excellent and service impeccable
review_full: The staff were friendly and helpful and the variety of shellfish we ate were good, but I was disappointed in the fish platter which was a variety of fresh fish which I thought were overcooked. The wine list is excellent and service impeccable

author: 509mtb
review_preview: We have been coming to this restaurant for many years now and we have never been disappointed. It is such a delight! The see food is to die for. So good, with just a little bit of olive oil and lemon and then "a la...
review_full: We have been coming to this restaurant for many years now and we have never been disappointed. It is such a delight! The see food is to die for. So good, with just a little bit of olive oil and lemon and then "a la plancha"! We recommend "almejas y cigalas a la plancha". Good selection of wines available. For us it us the best restaurant in the region. It is not by coincidence that it is always full... Reservation is a must. The two brothers that own the restaurant are always very kind. We surely recommend the place, children are always very welcome as well.

author: FincaelQuinto
review_preview: We visisted Ferrol and had the pleasure to meet some locals who directed us to this wonderful gastronomic experience.  The seafood is a delight - we started with the Almejas and cigalas (a speciality of the house) and had the lenguado as main dish -...
review_full: We visisted Ferrol and had the pleasure to meet some locals who directed us to this wonderful gastronomic experience. The seafood is a delight - we started with the Almejas and cigalas (a speciality of the house) and had the lenguado as main dish - do not forget to ask for the Albariño, typical white wine from the region, would have loved to go for a secone bottle but unfortunately had to drive. The service of Carlos and the family feel of the restaurant made the evening unforgetable - a must for everyone travelling in the area! Thank you very much for everything!

author: G3096QGdavidn
review_full: Era un día de celebración. Queríamos comer algo que nos quitase el sentido, y lo hizo. Comimos un menú degustacion de 7 platos, 6 dulces y uno salado, maridando un tinto de la zona. Espectacular. Una atención excelente, y la comida, digna del mismísimo Olimpo de los dioses. Saben perfectamente que repetiremos, porque fue una experiencia sublime.

author: Virginia_Santiago
review_full: Uno de los locales que más me gusta disfrutar en solitario, porque mis cinco sentidos están concentrados en los platos y no quiero que nadie me interrumpa . Y es una experiencia fantástica. El producto de primera calidad, la ejecución en la cocina es perfecta. Iría todas las semanas, merece mucho la pena. Seguid así, sois un equipazo. ❤️

author: Marta C
review_full: Volver a comer el David Freire siempre una fantástica decisión y yo vuelvo siempre que puedo. Además de los clásicos de su menú siempre te sorprende con novedades a la altura del paladar más exigente, y la vajilla, la presentacion, la cristaleria.......de absoluto lujo. Fantástico trato, fantástica comida, en resumen una fantástica experiencia, y fantastica relacion calidad precio.

author: antoCity
review_preview: If you want to eat something different from the tapas or the typical dishes you have to try this restaurant. The prices are quite high for the amount of food served, but the quality and the service are very good.
review_full: If you want to eat something different from the tapas or the typical dishes you have to try this restaurant. The prices are quite high for the amount of food served, but the quality and the service are very good.

author: Pane1nl
review_preview: This is a small family run restaurant with good service and food. Been there many times/years and they never dice point. Baby Scallops is my absolute favorite!
review_full: This is a small family run restaurant with good service and food. Been there many times/years and they never dice point. Baby Scallops is my absolute favorite!

author: carlitas
review_preview: Excellent pulpo offered after midnight together with a variety of tapas. We enjoyed fresh bread and top quality Mencia and above all, a very friendly welcome in this wonderful city.
review_full: Excellent pulpo offered after midnight together with a variety of tapas. We enjoyed fresh bread and top quality Mencia and above all, a very friendly welcome in this wonderful city.

author: danilasorindaniel
review_preview: Nice, away from city noise, nice parking lot, excellent view, delicious food, perfect service. Good for business lunch, but not only for this. You can have a romantic lunch or dinner too.
review_full: Nice, away from city noise, nice parking lot, excellent view, delicious food, perfect service. Good for business lunch, but not only for this. You can have a romantic lunch or dinner too.

author: xkfalcondeluxe
review_preview: If you’re looking for fine dining on a small plate share basis in Ferol then look no further!Service was great, head chef/owner was very welcoming and comfortably talked us through the menu options.  Food was superb, my personal favourites were the steak tartare, white...
review_full: If you’re looking for fine dining on a small plate share basis in Ferol then look no further! Service was great, head chef/owner was very welcoming and comfortably talked us through the menu options. Food was superb, my personal favourites were the steak tartare, white tuna and the white asparagus. Tip to find the fine establishment, use Google Maps not Apple Maps!

author: Watson_Inc
review_preview: Two work collegues and I went to this restaurant on the recommendation of a locl person whom had just returned to Spain.  We found it after our various navigators had us walking around in circles and were delighted we did. We were warmly greeted by...
review_full: Two work collegues and I went to this restaurant on the recommendation of a locl person whom had just returned to Spain. We found it after our various navigators had us walking around in circles and were delighted we did. We were warmly greeted by the Head Chef and staff and given our language barrier they help us select items from the Menu and a bootle of red wine to go with our meals. Its small tapas style plates but we shared six courses between the three of us. Each one was beautifully presented and full of flavour with some being absolutely fantastice such as the Steak Tartare, the White Asparagus and also a dish called Whute Tuna. They were all delicious. As second bottle of wine went down quite easily as well. Food, Staff and attention to detail was truly memorable for all the right reasons. Hope to go back again before we leave Ferrol, but will definitely go back next time we are hear.

author: ThornadoNorway
title_review: Best restaurant in Ferrol, no discussion
review_preview: I have been to O Camino Do Ingles in the past, at the old location. This is my first visit in the new place.First, the new restaurant is just gorgeous. From the ambiance, the clean minimalistic interior and colors. Also marvelous to have the...
review_full: I have been to O Camino Do Ingles in the past, at the old location. This is my first visit in the new place. First, the new restaurant is just gorgeous. From the ambiance, the clean minimalistic interior and colors. Also marvelous to have the open kitchen to watch the chefs working. As always the service is impeccable and they have taken all to a higher level.  I think they are reaching for a Michelin star in the future.  We had a tasting menu, plus some extras after this.  Everything were amazing and gave us a exceptional tasting experience. Also with wine pairing, it was all perfect! I do see that on TripAdvisor other restaurants are above O Camino, this is just a joke and shows have unserious a lot of people are when giving reviews in TripAdvisor.  I have been to all of these restaurants on the top of the list, and please be serious and understand that O Camino Do Ingles are way better than anyone else in Ferrol. I do travel a lot around the world and let me say that I am a ”foodie”, so I am very serious about reviews. Best of luck for you guys, and again thank you for a exceptional dinner evening at your great great restaurant. You are a great team. Will be back of course, next time I am in Ferrol!

author: ericbW2645OV
review_preview: Best place in town. Customer service is superb. Waiter was really nice and quality of the food was wonderful. A must if you come or pass by Ferrol!!!
review_full: Best place in town. Customer service is superb. Waiter was really nice and quality of the food was wonderful. A must if you come or pass by Ferrol!!!

author: stuartclarkau
review_preview: Just had dinner at O'Galo after a long trip back to Ferrol from Porto. We were welcomed by the most friendly waiter Fran, our new friend. Service was great, and although I'm learning Spanish and Fran has excellent English, he was very patient and happy...
review_full: Just had dinner at O'Galo after a long trip back to Ferrol from Porto. We were welcomed by the most friendly waiter Fran, our new friend. Service was great, and although I'm learning Spanish and Fran has excellent English, he was very patient and happy to help us with the menu. The food is some of the best we've eaten in Ferrol, and thats saying something. They serve generous portions of freshly sourced local produce, cooked to perfection, great bread and a happy to advise you on the wine list. I would definitely recommend the Zamerińos full racione!!! We will DEFINITELY be back soon. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

author: Maks matej C
review_preview: So I wanted to go for a quick and cheap meal with my family. And we have absolutely got what we expected. delicious. I would also like to mention the friendly waiter Fran, who was so enthusiastic, gave helpful advice and spoke English very good.
review_full: So I wanted to go for a quick and cheap meal with my family. And we have absolutely got what we expected. delicious. I would also like to mention the friendly waiter Fran, who was so enthusiastic, gave helpful advice and spoke English very good.

author: evans81051
title_review: Very Fine Restaurant Along the Camino
review_preview: A very wide selection of traditional Galician, as well as many other food choices.  Prices were very reasonable, service was very attentive, and the restaurant was right in the heart of town with good shopping very near.  A highly recommended place to dine while on...
review_full: A very wide selection of traditional Galician, as well as many other food choices. Prices were very reasonable, service was very attentive, and the restaurant was right in the heart of town with good shopping very near. A highly recommended place to dine while on the Camino.

author: FernandoB732
review_preview: Ferrol at times may feel like a deteriorating city yet we encountered a gem of a restaurant near the port. We had dinner at Camino, in a small nondescript street near the marina. No signs outside yet great food inside. A very modern setting with...
review_full: Ferrol at times may feel like a deteriorating city yet we encountered a gem of a restaurant near the port. We had dinner at Camino, in a small nondescript street near the marina. No signs outside yet great food inside. A very modern setting with an open kitchen allows you to see the wonderful kitchen staff about their duties creating wonderful and inventive food. The Zamburiñas and the signature Zorza are particularly good and original. An excellent sommelier lovingly describes his carefully curated collection of wines. Efficient and very friendly young staff. Very reasonable pricing for this quality. Highly recommended.

author: Sue S
review_preview: This restaurant is very close to the parador. It is friendly and welcoming,and run by people with a passion for local food used cooked. The menu is small plates which we prefer, mostly fish. We had marinated tuna, tiny scallops, white asparagus, sea bream -...
review_full: This restaurant is very close to the parador. It is friendly and welcoming,and run by people with a passion for local food used cooked. The menu is small plates which we prefer, mostly fish. We had marinated tuna, tiny scallops, white asparagus, sea bream - all excellent. Followed by the best rice pudding my husband thought he had ever eaten - and he has eaten a good few! Excellent wine, worth booking. We would definitely return.

author: 3milzero
title_review: If Ya Got One Night In Ferrol, Go Here
review_preview: Recommended by Loli from the Hotel Suizo, El Gallo is quite a surprise. We ordered, croquetas, pinchos, and bocadito, along with a large bottle of Estrella Galicia. The food was excellent, very simple but expertly flavored. Their seasoning is straight to the point, no fancy...
review_full: Recommended by Loli from the Hotel Suizo, El Gallo is quite a surprise. We ordered, croquetas, pinchos, and bocadito, along with a large bottle of Estrella Galicia. The food was excellent, very simple but expertly flavored. Their seasoning is straight to the point, no fancy colors or gimmicks, just good food. They also pair well with beer. A large bread basket came complimentary as well. All in all, it cost 24 EUR. As good, if not better, than the food was the service we received. Everyone was kind and courteous, being patient with us since we are not fluent Spanish speakers. Fran was especially kind to us and made us feel very welcome. We only had one night to spend in Ferrol, and dinner at El Gallo was time well spent.

author: janeg447
review_preview: An excellent local restaurant, lovely staff and superb food. Very busy but worth waiting for! It was the first time either of us had eaten cuttlefish and it was gorgeous.
review_full: An excellent local restaurant, lovely staff and superb food. Very busy but worth waiting for! It was the first time either of us had eaten cuttlefish and it was gorgeous.

author: Debbie S
review_preview: Had a selection of tapas here including very fresh shell fish . The local wine was excellent and the food freshly prepared and delicious . The service was friendly and the waiter went out of his way to help us . Thank you for a...
review_full: Had a selection of tapas here including very fresh shell fish . The local wine was excellent and the food freshly prepared and delicious .  The service was friendly and the waiter went out of his way to help us .  Thank you for a lovely evening !

author: GeorgeKaplan87
review_preview: The best place to eat in Ferrol. The quantity of food is not their biggest strength but they compensate it with amazing quality and delicious products.
review_full: The best place to eat in Ferrol. The quantity of food is not their biggest strength but they compensate it with amazing quality and delicious products.

author: Anton A
review_preview: Best food in the city. Imaginative and absolutely delicious cuisine taking advantage of the outstanding local produce. Try and order as many items from the menu as possible, every dish is a pleasant surprise.
review_full: Best food in the city. Imaginative and absolutely delicious cuisine taking advantage of the outstanding local produce. Try and order as many items from the menu as possible, every dish is a pleasant surprise.

author: Asder123
review_preview: We had the chef recommend us his best dishes. Didn’t regret that at all. The food was truly amazing and an excellent fusion of authentic local ingredients made in a modern non-traditional way. A hidden gem.
review_full: We had the chef recommend us his best dishes. Didn’t regret that at all. The food was truly amazing and an excellent fusion of authentic local ingredients made in a modern non-traditional way. A hidden gem.

author: london_flaneur
title_review: Not to miss this one when in Ferrol
review_preview: We had the most pleasant evening with friends at O Galo, enjoyed a fantastic ribeiro with zamburinas, pimientos del padron and delicious croquetas. The staff is brilliant and they are knowlegeable about local produce, feel free to ask because you will get an honest answer.
review_full: We had the most pleasant evening with friends at O Galo, enjoyed a fantastic ribeiro with zamburinas, pimientos del padron and delicious croquetas. The staff is brilliant and they are knowlegeable about local produce, feel free to ask because you will get an honest answer.

author: Linton W
review_preview: We four had a delightful evening amongst the locals in this small, unassuming but warmly welcoming bar/restaurant. All our varied sharing dishes (mostly offered large or small) were freshly prepared and delicious. The excellent local wine was inexpensive and complemented the food beautifully. Overall, great...
review_full: We four had a delightful evening amongst the locals in this small, unassuming but warmly welcoming bar/restaurant. All our varied sharing dishes (mostly offered large or small) were freshly prepared and delicious. The excellent local wine was inexpensive and complemented the food beautifully. Overall, great value for money and highly recommended.

author: JCSalty
review_preview: We called into this restaurant and stumbled on a treasure... Fran the waiter was a cheeky star and guided us through ordering our tapas... The gambas and pulpo were to die for.... And the generous bottles of local liqueur banged on the table to help...
review_full: We called into this restaurant and stumbled on a treasure... Fran the waiter was a cheeky star and guided us through ordering our tapas... The gambas and pulpo were to die for.... And the generous bottles of local liqueur banged on the table to help ourselves was fun.. Local, fun, quality and reasonable price

author: Marta C
review_full: David Freire nos hizo disfrutar con todos los sentidos, el ambiente, la pulcritud, el gusto por el detalle, los olores, los sabores y la sonrisa del cocinero y el buen rollo que se veia por debajo de la mascarilla y sin pretensiones solo cocinar y agradar. El Menu que podeis ver en la fotos colmo todas nuestras expectativas y fue sorprendiendonos poco a poco. Voy a explicaros mis sensaciones al comer cada plato, que ya sabéis que la comida es para mi sentimiento.........El Foie delicadeza, Zamburiñas de la Ria explosión de mar en la boca, Calamar de Potera el gusto por el punto, Steak Tartar perfeccion de sazón y de corte, Ravioli de Conejo sorpresa en el paladar, Carrillera el sabor de toda la vida y para endulzar el final una maravillosa Torrija con salsa de Toffe que endulzaba sin empalagar. Las fotos no pueden reflejarlo todo pero si creo que os dejara la miel en los labios. Para los amantes del detalle fijaos en como estan planchados los manteles......son pequeñeces que para mi marcan la diferencia. Asi que deseando volver y que me sigan sorprendiendo

author: albertog_mezg
review_full: Descubrí este sitio por los comentarios positivos y me decidí a probarlo,y ciertamente el sitio de 11, el trato del personal y de David excelente y por supuesto el menú degustación INCREÍBLE. 7 platos de auténtico lujo y con productos de la tierra y una recomendación también de un vino muy bueno. En definitiva para repetir sin dudarlo.

author: Eva P
review_full: Excelente sorpresa al dar con un lugar, por casualidad, del que nunca había escuchado hablar. La sala con una disposición y decoración totalmente acogedora y confortable. Respetando todos los protocolos de higiene que requiere la situación actual y con el plus de cuidar detalles que añaden seguridad, como ofrecer desde el principio toallitas higienizantes. El servicio súper amable, atento y muy acertado en sus recomendaciones. Y todavía mejor, la comida, con una excelente relación calidad-precio para el tipo de comida que ofrecen (cocina de mercado e innovadadora). Producto de calidad, fresco, abundante y, algo que valoro especialmente en este tipo de cocina, con una gran armonía de la conjugación de sabores y respeto de su intensidad. Pedimos el menú degustación, todo delicioso y abundante. Sin duda, para repetir.

author: Soniaferf
review_full: Fantástico sitio. Abrió solo para nosotros y nos sorprendió. Gran Menú degustación. Producto de la tierra preparado con mucho detalle. Un toque diferente pero respetando el producto. Buen trabajo. Volveremos.

author: CosmicStranger
review_preview: The place has the most hospitable place in Ferrol. The cuisine is highly oriented in local sea food. They also serve carne /meat and cerdo /pork. Chipirones/Baby squids are my favorite but Zamburinas are the peak of joy. (They have larger ones compared to other...
review_full: The place has the most hospitable place in Ferrol. The cuisine is highly oriented in local sea food. They also serve carne /meat and cerdo /pork. Chipirones/Baby squids are my favorite but Zamburinas are the peak of joy. (They have larger ones compared to other restaurants.) Local beer is superb, wines both red / white are high quality. Fran is the name of the waiters , Speaks English .

author: wolf8668
review_preview: The whole Street is packed with amazing restaurants. And Frank is no exception. The food was simply amazing, prepared perfectly. The ambience was good and staff could be a little bit more attentive (1 waitress on a busy night is not enough) but other than...
review_full: The whole Street is packed with amazing restaurants. And Frank is no exception. The food was simply amazing, prepared perfectly. The ambience was good and staff could be a little bit more attentive (1 waitress on a busy night is not enough) but other than that dining in Frank was one of the more enjoyable experiences

author: XianaX
review_full: Restaurante en la entrada de Ferrol en una calle tranquilisima y con poca iluminacion, que pasa desapercibido cuando tiene una relación calidad-cantidad-precio excelente; poca publicidad y mucho boca en boca aunque por ahora poco conocido lo que les permite trabajar sin estrés. Respeto por el producto y buen sabor (si quieres sabores disfrazados no es tu sitio). Postre delicioso. Acogedor, ambiente tranquilo y servicio relajado (al.principio nos extraño la demora en traernos la carta tras una rápida recepción).  Personal muy atento,agradable y servicial (seguir sus consejos y recomendaciones que son muy acertadas).

author: betty_rockstar
review_full: El producto es excelente,la comida buenísima y el personal inmejorable,parada obligada si estás en Ferrol,de los mejores restaurantes sin lugar a dudas!!

author: lpnoval
review_full: David, te recomiendo al 100%, por la calidad del producto, de calidad de verdad, y no solo la calidad del producto, vajillas manteles... todo cuidado al milímetro.  Gracias por hacernos vivir una experiencia gastronómica única en la comarca de ferrolterra, creo que nadie tiene un producto tan único y bueno como tú.  Y por no hablar del precio, calidad precio inigualable.  Gracias David, repetiremos mil veces más.

author: Kgaitan
review_preview: We had the best dinner of scallops, cuttlefish and mussels. Francisco provided great service. It couldn’t have been a better evening.
review_full: We had the best dinner of scallops, cuttlefish and mussels. Francisco provided great service. It couldn’t have been a better evening.

author: mcuckson
review_preview: Amazing food and even better service. Would recommend the zamburiñas. Try the local red wine, very good as well.
review_full: Amazing food and even better service. Would recommend the zamburiñas. Try the local red wine, very good as well.

author: FedericoB233
review_preview: A small but nice place. Maybe you wouldn't say when you get in, but the food is amazing and the service is friendly and quick. If you happen in Ferrol, a must.
review_full: A small but nice place. Maybe you wouldn't say when you get in, but the food is amazing and the service is friendly and quick. If you happen in Ferrol, a must.

author: Maxim S
review_preview: Nice place, great food. Wine by the glass was very good. We liked the Godeillo and the Ribeira... ps We loved the burgers and the sweets.
review_full: Nice place, great food. Wine by the glass was very good. We liked the Godeillo and the Ribeira... ps We loved the burgers and the sweets.

author: MGRCal
review_preview: The best food experience we've had in Ferrol. We ate several courses and where suprised by the crab and shrimps. They add alternative bread and suggestions for celiac customers and the wine proposed was spot on. I would reccomend it but make sure you book...
review_full: The best food experience we've had in Ferrol. We ate several courses and where suprised by the crab and shrimps. They add alternative bread and suggestions for celiac customers and the wine proposed was spot on. I would reccomend it but make sure you book in advance or a table is hard to get

author: maria m
review_preview: I was walking in the city centre and I met such nice small restaurant.I was sad but as soon as I started eating Frank's food, smile came back quickly!good and sophisticated food, good price! Strong recommended!
review_full: I was walking in the city centre and I met such nice small restaurant.I was sad but as soon as I started eating Frank's food, smile came back quickly!good and sophisticated food, good price! Strong recommended!

author: MaryIlivesinSpain
review_preview: Enjoyed a really good meal (croquettes to die for, fantastic shrimp, loved the salad) in a really nice ambiance.Really well put together on locally sourced products.The restaurant is small and getting to be well known, so it's best to make a reservation.
review_full: Enjoyed a really good meal (croquettes to die for, fantastic shrimp, loved the salad) in a really nice ambiance.Really well put together on locally sourced products.The restaurant is small and getting to be well known, so it's best to make a reservation.

author: msanchez7341
review_full: Excelente comida. Muy buen producto y muy bien tratado. Muy buena relación calidad precio Carta reducida pero muy interesante

author: DFRANCO84
review_full: En mi visita a este restaurante he de decir que me ha impresionado. En primer lugar la comida y la bebida ha sido de 10 en sabor, producto fresco de calidad y presentación. El servicio igualmente a la misma altura, me encontré con un camarero super atento y amable y tanto el y el cocinero se preocuparon en todo momento que todo estuviera a mi gusto. El local muy acogedor y me sentí como en casa repetiría sin dudarlo. Cabe destacar que todo el local está inmaculado limpio y ordenado y todo el equipo mascarilla en todo momento y pude ver como desinfectaban cartas mobiliario y baños hasta las manillas después de usarlas. En definitiva el mejor sitio para disfrutar tranquilo y seguro.

author: conchitav224
review_full: Como dije en mi visita anterior, se merecía volver, y no ha podido ser mejor. La cocina de David es maravillosa, de la tierra con una vuelta personal fruto de un trabajo bien hecho. El ambiente en su casa, en estos tiempos de Covid, solo te da tranquilidad y seguridad. Felicidades y enhorabuena. Seguro que habrá tercera.

author: marcopolo5000
review_full: Producto muy bueno y cocina notable. El local resulta íntimo y el personal es profesional. El día que fuimos solo tenían los platos del menú de degustación (muy escasos y poco variados). Las cantidades (pidiendo a la carta) claramente insuficientes y con precios de restaurante de estrella michelín (Árbore, Culler,...). El señor Freire no tuvo la gentileza de saludarnos aún a pesar de que éramos los únicos comensales. Aún así, se merece otra visita, porque un mal día lo puede tener cualquiera.

author: luciapr2017
review_full: He ido ya en varias ocasiones y la comida es muy buena y siempre excepcionalmente elaborada. El producto es de primera calidad. David, el chef, siempre atento a las opiniones y muy implicado en cumplir los gustos del comensal. Carta un poco escasa y quizás mucho tiempo de espera, pero va por muy buen camino

author: severineD256
title_review: A few very palatable veggie dishes
review_preview: Walked in on Saturday evening around 20.30h and were able to score two seats at the bar. The staff were very friendly and speak French and English. We wanted some piementos de padron, which were unfortunately not available. But we received a ration of very...
review_full: Walked in on Saturday evening around 20.30h and were able to score two seats at the bar. The staff were very friendly and speak French and English. We wanted some piementos de padron, which were unfortunately not available. But we received a ration of very tasty oyster mushrooms (setas), machego and a perfectly cooked frittata con patatas. Accompanied by a few glasses of nice wine, we had a wonderful and light dinner!  The scallops and whole sardines ( or similar fish) looked great as well. Simple but cosy and authentic interior. Locals kept on walking in and out. Highly recommended!

author: PolAC1981
review_full: Estuvimos en una comida familiar 5 personas, y el resultado no pudo ser mejor. Pedimos el menú degustación, y al tener dudas sobre si cambiar algún plato, el propio David Freire se ofreció a elaborarnos un menú con más opciones para que pudiésemos probar más platos. Fue todo un acierto. La calidad de la comida es espectacular, destacando el Foie, el steak tartar y la falsa lasagna de conejo. La torrija del postre a la altura del resto del menú. Ha pasado a ser uno de nuestros restaurantes favoritos.

author: Pane1nl
title_review: One of the best I Ferrol!
review_preview: Been too Ferrol a couple of times, but not until recently found this treasure! Fantastic tapas, friendly staff. And if you like seafood, you must try their babyscallops, fantastic. If I come here again, I could eat here everyday!
review_full: Been too Ferrol a couple of times, but not until recently found this treasure! Fantastic tapas, friendly staff. And if you like seafood, you must try their babyscallops, fantastic. If I come here again, I could eat here everyday!

author: paulbH4175BG
review_preview: Excellent seafood cooked up for a hungry group of travellers. We had gambas, scallops and cuttlefish with a side of chorizo. Restaurant was full of locals on a Monday night.
review_full: Excellent seafood cooked up for a hungry group of travellers. We had gambas, scallops and cuttlefish with a side of chorizo. Restaurant was full of locals on a Monday night.

author: JayB71
review_preview: Good and authentic spanish food. Also good local wine available. And good service. Inside or outside seating.
review_full: Good and authentic spanish food. Also good local wine available. And good service. Inside or outside seating.

author: Emr_1987
review_full: El producto es de primera calidad y el cocinado bueno. El local íntimo y con personal profesional. Pedimos a la carta y las raciones un poco escasas para el precio que tienen

author: Nesca56
review_full: Comimos el menú degustación y es una experiencia espectacular. Calidad, atención, producto, elaboración, servicio de 10. Recomendables 100%. Calidad- precio muy buena.

author: franecho75
review_full: Excelente. Imprescindible en Ferrol. Producto y cocina de primer nivel. Atención y ambiente impecables.

author: O8509KBmiguela
review_full: Comimos el menú degustación,dado que no nos gustaba uno de los platos que traía el menu,nos lo modifico muy atento en cada momento de que fuéramos bien comidos. Los platos espectaculares,estaba todo riquisimo. No tardaremos mucho en repetir. Al que le guste comer bien y probar cosas diferentes,lo recomiendo 100x100.

author: RoyMa6
review_full: Sitio tranquilo donde disfrutar de una comida de vanguardia y un buen servicio de mesa. Escogimos el Menú de 40€/persona (bebida aparte). Estuvo compuesto de 7 platos y postre. Cada plato desprendía un aroma espectacular y se veía cuidado cada detalle. Nos encantó, el foie, el choco, la lasaña de conejo y sobretodo el postre...exquisito!! En todo momento hubo una preocupación sobre nuestra opinión de los platos y el apetito. El Chef se preocupó al final del servicio en saber nuestra opinión personal. 100% recomendable si buscas algo distinto y distinguido.

author: Xoa C
review_full: platos ricos, carta corta y bien elaborada y precio moderado. Buena relación calidad precio. Postres ricos.

author: Christine B
review_preview: What a great local restaurant! A delicious and fresh meal. Scallops with butter and garlic, Cockles steamed with lemon, Pimientos de Padron with salt and olive oil...all so simply prepared and so tasty - all accompanied by a good Albariño. The service was very friendly...
review_full: What a great local restaurant! A delicious and fresh meal. Scallops with butter and garlic, Cockles steamed with lemon, Pimientos de Padron with salt and olive oil...all so simply prepared and so tasty - all accompanied by a good Albariño. The service was very friendly and professional. A must if in this general area. We stopped for only lunch in Ferrol!

author: Андрей К
review_preview: Very friendly personnel and nice service. Food is delicious and authentic.  Home atmosphere!!! Small and tidy place.
review_full: Very friendly personnel and nice service. Food is delicious and authentic.  Home atmosphere!!! Small and tidy place.

author: kingflash
review_preview: Tried a few local restaurant and visited this restaurant before our departure from Spain.The staff, Fran was very friendly and helpful who tried his very best to explain the menu to us in English and the restaurant was famous among the locals.It's a...
review_full: Tried a few local restaurant and visited this restaurant before our departure from Spain. The staff, Fran was very friendly and helpful who tried his very best to explain the menu to us in English and the restaurant was famous among the locals. It's a place for good local cuisine.

author: lorenaroes
review_full: Fuimos a comer cinco personas. Pedimos menú degustación y David Freire nos lo adaptó para que pudiéramos probar muchas cosas. Nos pusieron platos al centro de la mesa y platos individuales. Todo estaba buenísimo pero a destacar el foie, El steak tartar y la lasaña de conejo. Como postre, una torrija impresionante. Muy buen producto y muy buena cocina a un precio ajustado.

author: Patricia R
review_full: Me encantó, pedimos un menu de 5 platos y todo impresionante, para volver seguro. Trato personalizado exquisito.

author: juliojosev2016
review_full: Velada tranquila, ambiente acogedor, buena comida ( productos de la zona bien elaborados) , trato personal excelente.

author: GeorgeKaplan87
title_review: Great place to have a relaxing time.
review_preview: The waiters are very friendly. You should pay attention of the food recommendations that they will make you. Great quality great price!
review_full: The waiters are very friendly. You should pay attention of the food recommendations that they will make you. Great quality great price!

author: marianacondemena
review_preview: In Ferrol, we were not expecting to be impressed by food, we were just looking to have some simple tapas and move along. However O Galo was indeed a  pleasant surprise. The place is a simple taverna with a nestle ice cream fridge inside, so...
review_full: In Ferrol, we were not expecting to be impressed by food, we were just looking to have some simple tapas and move along. However O Galo was indeed a pleasant surprise. The place is a simple taverna with a nestle ice cream fridge inside, so really, nothing there was hinting what was to come: most amazing scallops (zamburiñas) we have had in our life, or the fried choco (cuttlefish) on fries with a red pepper salsa and the garlic mushrooms. On top of everything, the place ir real good value. Dessert of orujo cake was good but even better was the shot of coffee flavored orujo, which our superbly funny and helpful waiter, Fran, gave us, complimentary. So, if you ever find yourself in Ferrol, don’t think about it twice, head there, and send our regards to Fran.

author: Grousedoctor
review_preview: Arrived late into Ferrol, but O’Galo was very busy and filled with locals. The reviews here on Tripadvisor didn’t steer us wrong. We asked our most charming waiter for a few suggestions so we ended up with pulpo, scallops, and coddle fish for starters. And,...
review_full: Arrived late into Ferrol, but O’Galo was very busy and filled with locals. The reviews here on Tripadvisor didn’t steer us wrong. We asked our most charming waiter for a few suggestions so we ended up with pulpo, scallops, and coddle fish for starters. And, the pimientos de Padron were to die for! Everything was delicious. Great service as well. Our food came out in courses, so we were able to savor each dish. If one has an image of a vibrant Spanish restaurant that’s a favorite with locals, this has to be it. I could eat here every night!

author: Manuelqp200
review_full: Por las referencias de los viajeros nos atrevimos a reservar en un lugar absolutamente desconocido. Ubicado en un barrio periférico de Ferrol y sin gran identificación exterior se encuentra un lugar sencillo. Presidido por la barra, el comedor de pequeño tamaño con una decoración muy sencilla sin ser minimalista, nada aventura lo que viene a continuación. Nos prepararon una mesa amplia, con sillas robustas en las que cada comensal dispone de un espacio amplio sin estar lejano al resto. Mantelería de impoluto blanco y planchada de forma impecable. Ofrece breve carta de cocina contemporánea, pudiéndose optar por un menú a razón de 40 euros por persona, vino y cafés a parte. En esta última opción nos encontramos con seis pases más postres, bodega corta y diferente, pero suficiente para sentirse a gusto y dejarse llevar. Nuestro degustación empezó por un bonito estupendo, foie espectacular, zamburiñas de fábula, tartar de carne de vaca para morirse, chipirón como no vi otro y final con conejo cubierto con pasta descomunal. Torrija con helado de postre, asombrosa. Todo regado con un albariño y un godello, ambos espléndidos. La atención de sala muy muy muy buena, los tiempos de servicio fenomenales. Al final salió el artista a charlar un rato con nosotros y comentarnos algunos entresijos de sus quehaceres. En resumen, un lugar privilegiado, a un precio que no dentro de mucho veremos multiplicado por dos o por tres. Un cocinero con un talento singular, arropado por un técnica depurada; y todo ello con un grado de madurez apreciable en su cocina. Todo un tesoro.

author: tripavisadora
review_full: Buscando un Tripadvisor un buen restaurante en Ferrol encontramos esta joya escondida. Se trata de un restaurante para pocos comensales y con un servicio muy personalizado. Si la materia prima es de primera calidad ,el mimo y respeto por su cocinado es excelente. En esta ocasión había menú desgustación que nos personalizaron según nuestras preferencias. Volveremos

author: G6938IUalbertom
review_full: El otro día fui a comer a este restaurante y me ha parecido una autentica pasada, el cariño y cuidado con el que que se trata al producto en este local es impresionante, empece con un salmon marinado que tenia una textura y un sabor excepcionales, a continuación el que fué mi plato favorito y que adjunto foto del mismo es el foiegrass, os aseguro que no hay otro parecido, de locos, despues un calamar de la ría de Ferrol pasado por la plancha brevemente y finalizado a soplete, un manjar, despues un rape muy rico y para finalizar los platos salados un tartar de los mejores que recuerdo, de postre, torrija con toffe suave y delicado, buenisima, todo esto acompañado de un vino blanco macerado con sus pieles y raspon,’ El incomprendido’ un autentico acierto por parte del dueño, que fue quien me lo recomendo y que con su bien hacer y simpatia le pone la guinda a una comida de pelicula.

author: O8509KBmiguela
review_full: Bueno, mi tercera vez que voy a a comer ahí. Está vez solo quiero decir ''espectacular'' como siempre y más con todo lo que estamos viviendo. David a ti y a tu equipo impresionante lo el trato lo primero y tus platos, alguno me ha hecho llorar del sabor impresionante. Un sitio que hay que probar que está cocina no se come todos los días.Me encanta. Muchas gracias por la recomendación del vinoy de vuestro trato, espero que pronto pase esto y que tengáis mucha suerte. Muchas Gracias por el menú de hoy. Subo un parte de las fotillos de todo lo que hemos comido

author: Amorodos
review_full: Suelo ir de restaurante cada vez que el bolsillo me lo permite. Esta es la tercera vez que voy y cada vez os superais más. El camarero es encantador y me explicó todo al detalle lo mismo que el chef el cual como todas la veces que he ido me ha venido a preguntar que me había parecido todo. Lo recomiendo, para mi un diez.

author: carancero
review_full: excelente,todo muy rico,muy buena atencion y personal muy preparado,productos de primerisima calidad

author: Roberto P
review_full: Cambia de lo típico en Galicia. La comida de mercado rica y de calidad. El trato 10 con muy buenas recomendaciones y un servicio muy bueno.

author: AlessioAndreani
review_preview: Lovely place to eat authentic food at a moderate price. Highly recommended. Pulpo is definitely a speciality here, but also try the Tortilla cooked at the momento, cheap and satisfying!
review_full: Lovely place to eat authentic food at a moderate price. Highly recommended. Pulpo is definitely a speciality here, but also try the Tortilla cooked at the momento, cheap and satisfying!

author: Elisefromaustralia
review_preview: The food was excellent, the waiters English was limited but he went above and beyond to translate and explain the menu and made the meal a great experience. Would defiantly recommend. Best croquettes in Spain!!
review_full: The food was excellent, the waiters English was limited but he went above and beyond to translate and explain the menu and made the meal a great experience. Would defiantly recommend. Best croquettes in Spain!!

author: George_KOUL
review_preview: Very nice place I have tasted  delicious plates served by very friendly employees. For sure I will visit it again.
review_full: Very nice place I have tasted  delicious plates served by very friendly employees. For sure I will visit it again.

author: 639joannab
review_preview: This place was packed on Maundy Thursday. There was a long wait for tables, but we were able to order wine by the glass at the bar while we waited. We ended up eating at the bar and it was fresh and delicious.
review_full: This place was packed on Maundy Thursday. There was a long wait for tables, but we were able to order wine by the glass at the bar while we waited. We ended up eating at the bar and it was fresh and delicious.

author: deltibero
review_full: lugar tranquilo,personal agradable y excelente materia prima y su elaboracion muy trabajada y mejor presentada

author: martina807dl
review_full: Restaurante con cocina de mercado pequeño y muy acogedor, ambiente agradable y tranquilo, un trato exquisito por parte de todo el personal, David es un excelente anfitrión que te ayuda acertadamente a elegir los platos. Probamos unas zamburiñas espectacularmente exquisitas, seguidas de paté, falsa lasaña de conejo y raya, todo riquísimo. De postre una torrija con una mezcla tan sutil de sabores que la hacen indescriptible. Para volver, sin duda.

author: Toni O
review_full: Velada fantástica. La atención es de 12 sobre 10. La comida, tomamos el menú degustación y fue todo un recital de sabores con los productos más emblemáticos de la zona. Las cantidades de este menú son buenas y la calidad excepcional. Presentación de los platos sencilla, pero muy elegante. Buena recomendación para el vino. Todo un acierto para una velada especial, pues te hacen sentir así con su gran atención y el mimo que le ponen en todo.

author: FerGerman
review_full: Vinimos con un gran incertidumbre y la verdad que nos vamos con ganas de volver.  Todo producto de la zona y elaborado al punto perfecto y sin mucho aderezo para poder comerlo con su verdadero sabor.  Muy recomendable por la comida y por el trato de David y su personal.  Muchas gracias.

author: Anna R
review_full: Buen servicio, casi personalizado, muy interesantes los tiempos de cocción. Para ir sin prisa y disfrutar  Tranquilo No es es típico sitio que algunos buscan en Galicia. Algo diferente, en otras ubicaciones habría cola... Imprescindible

author: Kikitovic
review_full: Cuarta visita a un remodelado local en una zona poca hostelera de la ciudad, al cual hace unos años ni habrías entrado, pero no te dejes engañar por las apariencias, David lo ha transformado y ahora se come de lujo. Cocina con producto de mercado de mucha calidad, con lo que toque según la temporada del año,ejecutada de una forma sobresaliente. Hemos probado muchas elaboraciones, destacando por encima de todas el calamar, la lasaña de centollo y el rape negro. Es un lugar para ir a cenar tranquilo y disfrutar, hay pocas mesas y el trato es muy cercano y personal, lo cual se agradece. En resumen, si lo que te gusta es comer bien y lo del local y vistas para ti es secundario (lo cual se agradece por los precios contenidos) para mí sin duda éste es el mejor restaurante de la ciudad relación precio/placer.

author: Viqui20
review_full: Absolutamente todo! Una comida excepcional, con un producto maravilloso que no puede estar mejor tratado, se nota perfectamente el cariño y la ilusión con la que hacen su trabajo. Todo absolutamente cuidado, los platos, las copas, un ambiente acogedor que hace que disfrutes del momento totalmente. Y David, un encanto. Para mi, una estrella Michelin, como le dije.

author: cheloc328
review_full: Queriamos conocer un sitio nuevo y nos fiamos de las opiniones de la página, no nos ha decepcionado en absoluto, destacaría sobre todo la ensalada de bacalao ¡ Espectacular! Pero nos ha gustado todo, merece la pena. Un sitio muy agradable y el camarero encantador, totalmente recomendable

author: Fernando F
review_full: Nunca imaginé que disfrutaría de una cocina de mercado, de diseño y no saldría diciendo “fue un poco escaso”. Local acogedor, buena atención y David explicando cada plato y contestando a cada pregunta con entusiasmo; se ve que disfruta con lo que hace. El precio…, no es para ir todos los días pero no es nada caro teniendo en cuenta lo que recibes y disfrutas. Volveremos seguro.

author: IsadoCoto
review_full: Que gran descubrimiento!!!! Nos gusta mucho la buena comida con innovación y que nos sorprenda! Y han dado en el clavo! El chef es tremendamente agradable y humilde! Repetiremos y no nos cansaremos de recomendarlo!

author: NOMASDECONSTRUCCION
review_full: Desde la entrada al local,amabilidad,buen trato y ritmo perfecto.El local deja entrever el que fuera anteriormente con una gran barra,ahora utilizada para recibir.Mesas,sillas y servicio de mesa excepcional.Menú de mercado muuuy rico,formado en nuestro caso por:Zamburiñas,tartar de jurel,cocochas pilpil,calamar,tosta de foie,carrilleras de rape,falsa lasaña y una torrija con helado de vainilla y toffe.TODO MUUY BUENO.Buen café,copa,etc.Precio adecuado (40€p.p + bebidas,etc.) Volveremos.

author: franciscojavierr473
review_full: Ya hacía tiempo que tenía ganas de probar este sitio y no defraudó, también estuvo muy bien la opción que nos dio David de hacernos el menú degustación a su elección de esta forma probamos mas platos, repetiremos seguro

author: angcid
review_full: He ido al restaurante a cenar con mi novia a celebrar mi cumpleaños y tanto el local como la comida nos encantó a los dos. Pedimos un menú degustación cada uno que resultaron ser un total de 6 pases más el postre. La comida un diez, no podemos decir otra cosa. Muy muy rica. El problema es que cada una de las comidas eran pues una o dos cucharadas aproximadamente y salimos con mucha hambre, tanto que nos zampamos al llegar a casa media tarta que nos había regalado su hermana. Era la primera vez que íbamos a un sitio de tipo degustación y no nos creíamos el tópico de mucha decoración pero sales con hambre, pero la verdad que al menos en este caso fue así. De todas formas, no pongo en duda que a otra persona le pueda resultar suficiente comida, pero se hace doloroso pagar 90 euros de cena para llegar a casa y tener que seguir comiendo. Por último un detalle que no nos gustó es que en el menú ni siquiera vaya incluido ni pan ni agua. Que haya que pagar el pan aparte en un menú de 40 euros nos pareció un tanto ruin. Aunque al césar lo que es del césar, la comida estaba deliciosa.

author: AngelitoGL
review_full: Se trata de un restaurante donde se cuida hasta el mínimo detalle. Un trato exquisito desde que se entra por la puerta hasta que se sale, creando un lugar agradable donde disfrutar de una buen almuerzo/cena con tu pareja o con tus amigos. Las veces que he tenido el placer de probar esta cocina... me ha dejado sin palabras.  Cada plato está trabajado con especial cariño y profesionalidad (Me arriesgo a decir que con una calidad en el producto inmejorable). Un restaurante 100% recomendable.

author: enterocito
review_full: Un local que pasa desapercibido en la calle. Ambiente tranquilo, trato excelente y personalizado. Menú degustación para 6 personas, espectacular el foie y las zamburiñas. Para repetir, sin duda.

author: Goodfood-goodmood11
title_review: Very good tipical food and very nice and friendly staff!
review_preview: We went there for lunch and were very pleased with the food and service. The staff is not only friendly, but also interested in their clients and like to have a personal chat which is such a nice thing when your travelling. We definitely recommend...
review_full: We went there for lunch and were very pleased with the food and service. The staff is not only friendly, but also interested in their clients and like to have a personal chat which is such a nice thing when your travelling. We definitely recommend this place!

author: 523PeterS523
review_preview: This is an excellent restaurant : Sashimi Sargo (white sea bream), tuna escabeche, merluzza with pies, ... Whatever we ordered, each dish was delicious. Both in terms of quality of ingredients and its preparation. In addition, an excellent service and a very nice list of...
review_full: This is an excellent restaurant : Sashimi Sargo (white sea bream), tuna escabeche, merluzza with pies, ... Whatever we ordered, each dish was delicious. Both in terms of quality of ingredients and its preparation. In addition, an excellent service and a very nice list of wines. If you like real honest food, this is a place that gives you goose bumps.

author: Nuria_MN87
review_full: Fuimos a comer 8 personas, recomendados por amigos y la experiencia fue bastante decepcionante.  El servicio empezó lento, tanto para tomarnos nota de las bebidas, traerlas, como para traernos la carta. Lo entenderíamos si hubiese mucha más gente en el comedor, pero sólo había 2 personas más. Empezamos tomando el steak tartar, muy poco sazonado y con un exceso importante de huevo. Lo siguiente, salmón ahumado cortado en dados, con una gota de aceite y ralladura de limón como única elaboración. Las zamburiñas estaban como medio crudas y no especialmente buenas. Los últimos platos, que fueron bacalao y falsa lasaña de conejo fueron los únicos que merecieron la pena. Bien preparados y ricos. Terminamos de comer y pedimos directamente la cuenta, sin postre ni café. Sorprende que el responsable no se acercase a preguntar qué tal la comida, cuando ya en el primer plato le habíamos dicho al camarero que no nos había gustado, además, siendo la mesa más grande del local. Sin embargo, con los demás clientes sí estuvo charlando un buen rato. En definitiva, el precio no se corresponde con la calidad de las elaboraciones de algunos de sus platos y no merece la pena pagar ese dinero con la oferta gastronómica que hay en Ferrol y comarca.

author: Elsalmon1970
review_full: Sencillamente "espectacular" la experiencia vivida en el restaurante de David Freire. Es un lujo encontrar restaurantes así. Una cocina de 10 y un trato de todo el equipo fantástico. Super recomendable.

author: Sergioelgallego
review_full: Sorpresa muy agradable, pedimos menú degustacion, precio muy razonable(35 euros), bebidas aparte, compuesto de tartar de jurel, zamburiñas, chipirones, rape con espárragos, Lasaña de conejo, Torrija con helado. Todo buenísimo y en cantidad suficiente para degustacion. Productos de primera calidad a precio accesible. La atención y servicio de 10, se recomienda reservar ya que es limitado el número de comensales. Como sugerencia, la calidad y buen hacer, quizá, merezcan otra zona de Ferrol más "vistosa". Totalmente recomendable y para repetir.

author: Marius P
review_preview: A popular place in Ferrol for foreigners. Food was good and service was nice. Without asking we were offered to bring the leftovers home, since it was what we have planned.
review_full: A popular place in Ferrol for foreigners. Food was good and service was nice. Without asking we were offered to bring the leftovers home, since it was what we have planned.

author: Spwoodthorpe
title_review: If we ever come back to Ferrol it will be for one reason and one reason only - to eat here again
review_preview: We went in search of a table on a Thursday, closed and had a sadly (and unusually) disappointing meal in the Parador where we were staying.Friday however we got lucky; they were fully booked but said –“come back in 15 mins and we can...
review_full: We went in search of a table on a Thursday, closed and had a sadly (and unusually) disappointing meal in the Parador where we were staying. Friday however we got lucky; they were fully booked but said –“come back in 15 mins and we can feed you until we need the table at 10 o’clock”. So we did. This was the best meal of our Galician/Austurian trip despite there being some great competition. They do plates to share which come one-by-one and recommend ¾ per couple. The head chef translates you through the menu (even in Spanish to locals) and his partner then deals with drinks – they even had Montilla style sherry to start with. The first course – loosely an echabeche of tuna was stunning. The 2 which followed a pulpo kebab and pork loin with cheesy mash and pickled carrot, were both excellent. They also made enough time before taking the table back to give us 2 lovely postres. There was nothing on the menu we did not want to try. In addition to the aperitif we had a bottle of Dorado 2005 a Portuguese alvarhinio on their recommendation when our choice was not fully chilled. This is an absolutely sensational 10-year old white wine which was unbelievable with the food – the tuna especially. At €27 it is the most expensive on the wine list but still cheaper than I have just paid back in the UK. The interaction with the staff was also a level above normal service and really elevated the experience. If we ever come back to Ferrol it will be for one reason and one reason only - to eat here again but on every night of our stay.

author: pilgrim002014
review_preview: I went there for the first time last week after so many friends recommended and I wasn't disappointed. So much so that I am trying again next week. Food is excellent, especially the fish dishes, bringing the humble species, like mackerel, to the top of...
review_full: I went there for the first time last week after so many friends recommended and I wasn't disappointed. So much so that I am trying again next week. Food is excellent, especially the fish dishes, bringing the humble species, like mackerel, to the top of the menu. My first experience was awesome, and it pleased every member of our large group. I can't wait to visit again to experience the ever changing menu, according to what's on offer down at the local market.

author: CookieMonster98798
title_review: The place to go in Ferrol
review_preview: If they rented rooms? I'd move in. Never the same experience two times, always an amazing time and food. I genuinely believe this place is the very essence of what galician food is all about.If you like creativity, you will be surrounded wall to wall...
review_full: If they rented rooms? I'd move in. Never the same experience two times, always an amazing time and food. I genuinely believe this place is the very essence of what galician food is all about.If you like creativity, you will be surrounded wall to wall with this food.

author: AlejandroP237
review_full: Local con decoración sobria, 4-5 mesas bajas.  Cena 3 personas, nos dejamos aconsejar por el chef. Disponen de menu degustación por 35€ (6 pases). - Tartar de jurel: rico - Zamburiñas (de verdad, no volandeiras): rico - Foie y reduccion pedro ximenez: muy rica - Tartar vaca: muy rico - Chipirones de anzuelo: rico - Rape negro con espárragos: rico - Falsa Lasaña conejo: rica - Solomillo cerdo: muy rico - Torrija con helado de vainilla: muy rico  156€ Botella de Godello, 1906, vermouth, botella de agua grande.  Personal atento y amable, nos atendió el chef personalmente.

author: cervezelassie
review_full: Venimos de madrid a pasar 15 o 20 días en Ferrol todos los veranos. Nos encanta probar los nuevos locales que, respetando la calidad del producto gallego, innovan y hacen una cocina diferente. Hemos probado en este local y solo puedo decir que es excelente. Limpio, acogedor, buena atención.. la comida es un 10 desde la apertura a cierre. Hoy, hemos comido. Dos opciones , el menú degustación o cocina de mercado del día . Nos decantamos por esta opción (varía a diario). Tartar de peixe (jurelo) steak tartar de ternera gallega , bacalao 65 grados , rape negro y falsa lasaña de pollo de corral. Para acabar, torrija con helado de vainilla y salsa de toffe. Todo regado con cava de 2010 + 2 cervezas de aperitivo. Todo por 102€ en lo que me parece un precio excelente para la calidad del producto, el esmerado detalle en su elaboración y presentación y el servicio.  Comimos en pareja y yo particularmente soy un poco sibarita escogiendo los lugares donde voy a comer. A partir de ahora este local estará en mi top 3 en Ferrol.

author: CristinaS1943
review_full: Una carta muy seleccionada y cuidada, con un producto bueno y tratado con mimo. El tartar de pescado, la falsa lasaña de conejo, el bacalao, el steak tartar, el chipirón con judías verdes y la torrija con helado y tofee nos conquistaron. Atención esmerada y cercana. Nos encantó. Sorprende y alegra toparse con restaurantes diferentes en Ferrol y aunque el barrio en el que se encuentra no le hace justicia, merece la pena. Absolutamente recomendable.

author: JosefinJ
title_review: Great service, awesome concept and tasty food
review_preview: You order dishes to share and the size of every dish was perfect. We were recommended to choose 3 dishes (two persons) but we were hungry and choose four. We did not regret us! Every dish was a taste-experience itself. The waiter got us a...
review_full: You order dishes to share and the size of every dish was perfect. We were recommended to choose 3 dishes (two persons) but we were hungry and choose four. We did not regret us! Every dish was a taste-experience itself. The waiter got us a table even though we did not make a reservation and the restaurant was fully booked. I recommend this to everyone!

review_full: The restaurant is located in the centre of the city. It is a very nice and warm place. The waitress was speaking in English and he was very polite, helpful and pleasant! He recommended to us some very tasty local food with pork and local wine. The food was very tasty and we really enjoyed the place and the service very very much!! We totally recommend it!!

author: Womblez
review_preview: A modern restaurant serving fresh food cooked in an interesting manner.  Daniel Lopez explained what was on his blackboard of daily dishes in good English in an enthusiastic manner.  All appeared to be from the local market and were served in modest portions, not for...
review_full: A modern restaurant serving fresh food cooked in an interesting manner. Daniel Lopez explained what was on his blackboard of daily dishes in good English in an enthusiastic manner. All appeared to be from the local market and were served in modest portions, not for the hungry student. We only asked for wine by the glass but were served an excellent local wine. We found this restaurant about 200 metres from the local Parador and were very pleased to dine there. Well worth the visit and the prices were reasonable.

author: MeliP523
review_preview: The food is original because they cook market goods with an special taste. They are very friendly and the atmosphere is very comfortable. The prices are not high. You can have luch paying not more than 25€

author: Mike220687
review_preview: A breath of fresh culinary air came to Ferrol when Daniel opened O Camino do Ingles.  With his team of enthusiastic cooks, he offers a varied and extensive menu of very interesting and tasty dishes; while modern, many are takes on traditional Galician recipes.  Prices...
review_full: A breath of fresh culinary air came to Ferrol when Daniel opened O Camino do Ingles. With his team of enthusiastic cooks, he offers a varied and extensive menu of very interesting and tasty dishes; while modern, many are takes on traditional Galician recipes. Prices too are very reasonable. Eva, his partner, looks after the wines and provides a wide selection of good Galician and Spanish wines, with prices displayed on the bottles. So popular has the restaurant become, that you have to reserve at weekends.  We are regular customers, not into texting and tweeting, but feel that Daniel's gastronomic excellence merits our contribution to all these recommendations, as well.

author: davidbX3277NG
review_preview: Four of us ate here on our first afternoon in Ferrol, before starting the Camino Inglès. We found it by chance, whilst walking through the old town. The maitre d was very helpful and on his recommendation we had 8 dishes. They are all tapas...
review_full: Four of us ate here on our first afternoon in Ferrol, before starting the Camino Inglès. We found it by chance, whilst walking through the old town. The maitre d was very helpful and on his recommendation we had 8 dishes. They are all tapas dishes and are individually prepared. Every one of them was delicious. He also recommended the wines for each dish. It was a fantastic start to our trip. It was a well spent 2.5hrs. I would absolutely recommend this restaurant.

author: botifarronetti
review_preview: Every time I visit Galicia is a fascinating trip. It is obvious they have excellent ingredients. Sea food and tasty meat. But this place located in Ferrol managed by a young and brave chef called Dani Lopez is a good example of that. It is...
review_full: Every time I visit Galicia is a fascinating trip.  It is obvious they have excellent ingredients. Sea food and tasty meat.  But this place located in Ferrol managed by a young and brave chef called Dani Lopez is a good example of that.  It is completely necessary to book a table to join his meals. A wonderful voyage to explore classy local food made by an emerging hand with great eye looking to the future.  The chef will advise you what to order and it's a must to follow his recommendations.  Service is good, nice local and a great opportunity for gastronomic explorers to discover a new place in a non valuated but magical area.

author: kingsimon
title_review: Excellent fusion dishes - a modern interpretation of Gallego cuisine
review_preview: I am in Ferrol about three times a year and I always want to go here. This summer, I went there twice. It is an absolutely incredible gastronomical adventure. It is not cheap, especially not for Spain but you won't get the dishes (that are...
review_full: I am in Ferrol about three times a year and I always want to go here. This summer, I went there twice. It is an absolutely incredible gastronomical adventure. It is not cheap, especially not for Spain but you won't get the dishes (that are being changed on a constant basis so you can always try something new) elsewhere. Needless to say that the fish and seafood variations are the most interesting, given the fresh produce they use. Absolutely to be recommended and if you trust rumors, it may be awarded with a Michelin star soon.

author: Randy46236
review_preview: We were delighted that our hotel clerk begged a last minute table for us if we left by ten.  What a wonderful experience with both chef choosing our five courses and sommelier choosing wine pairing.  An exciting fusion of local fresh fish, sashimi presentations and...
review_full: We were delighted that our hotel clerk begged a last minute table for us if we left by ten. What a wonderful experience with both chef choosing our five courses and sommelier choosing wine pairing. An exciting fusion of local fresh fish, sashimi presentations and Galician flavors. It matches some of the finest Michelin star restaurants we've dined at. Deserves a higher rating than 5! Bravo.

author: Simon H
title_review: Amazing chef, finest ingredients..... perfection on a plate.
review_preview: Four world travellers impressed exceptionally. The perfect explanation of the dishes by the chef, expertly prepared and the taste of every plate locked in that tast vault heaven. The aperitifs a perfect start to the meal and the wine waiter, the most helpful I have...
review_full: Four world travellers impressed exceptionally. The perfect explanation of the dishes by the chef, expertly prepared and the taste of every plate locked in that tast vault heaven. The aperitifs a perfect start to the meal and the wine waiter, the most helpful I have ever known to find the perfect accompaniment with the ingredients being prepared. It is this type of restaurant that will put Ferrol on the map, with gastronomic delights and hospitality that compares to the best of the best. The menu nicely thought using the freshest of locally sourced ingredients, a true taste of ingredients perfectly prepared using great culinary skill.

They use traditional and fresh ingredients from the local market to prepare them in a different and innovative way. It is a small restaurant with a very familiar ambiance. The staff is very friendly and they all speak English. The have also a great variety of nacional and foreign wines, and if you want, they recomend you which ones are the best according to your preferences. It is a very small and popular place, so It is better you book in advance.

author: soma0910
title_review: ONE OF OUR BEST MEALS IN SPAIN--MICHELIN STAR QUALITY
review_preview: What a delicious surprise it was to discover this restaurant in Ferrol!  Ferrol was a convenient stopping place as we drove the northern coast of Spain and we never expected to be so wowed by the town and by the food. The Parador was able...
review_full: What a delicious surprise it was to discover this restaurant in Ferrol! Ferrol was a convenient stopping place as we drove the northern coast of Spain and we never expected to be so wowed by the town and by the food. The Parador was able to get us a reservation at Camino do Ingles by our willingness to eat a very early dinner. Danny, the chef, was friendly and very animated and excited about his food--with reason. He explained all the dishes and we tried small plates of many dishes. The food is Mediterranean BUT also innovative fusion food---sashimi for example. Whatever you order will be fresh and delicious. I'm sure this restaurant will have a Michelin star in short order. The staff was efficient and friendly. There was outdoor dining but they didn't have that ready when we were there. We loved Ferrol and Camino do Ingles so much that we will probably return on our next trip to Spain. La Felicidad es el Camino no el Destino.

author: javepa
